mapper.sql: a.id AS id, a.username AS username, a.mobile AS mobile, a.email AS email, a.password AS password, a.password_exist AS passwordExist, a.pwd_expire_at AS pwdExpireAt, a.enabled AS enabled, a.locked AS locked, a.nickname AS nickname, a.avatar AS avatar, a.tenant_id AS tenantId, a.del_flag AS delFlag, a.create_by AS createBy, a.create_date AS createDate, a.update_by AS updateBy, a.update_date AS updateDate, a.remarks AS remarks
